txt.en: 'Let us discuss our options, for we must do something. It will not do to sit here and let Wildermore fall to the servants of Saruman.'
Gárwig wishes to debate the courses of action Wildermore must take regarding the recent White Hand attacks.\n\nYou should speak with Gárwig.

Gárwig says nothing, his face like stone.

Núrzum has truly crushed all that the old Reeve holds dear, and Wildermore seems as if it is ready to shatter at another blow.

The White Hand is winning in this land....
Gárwig is in the Mead Hall of Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gárwig.
Gárwig must decide what to do about Wildermore's dire situation.
The man shakes with terror. Something is amiss....

'You are good to me, [placeholder]. I might come to rely on you, if you continue to be so kind.\n\n'Perhaps you can help us in our time of need. My sons worry that my judgement is clouded by grief. I worry the same for them.'
See what the man at the door wants
'Help, please! Everyone is afraid! Something has come to the west gate....'
